DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this protocol is to study if two different tablet formulations of doxycycline are bioequivalent to each other.
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Between Two Tablet Formulations Of Doxycycline Carragenate
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subjects between the ages of 18 and 55 years. Body Mass Index (BMI) of 18 to 30 kg/m2. Evidence or history of clinically significant abnormality. Any condition possibly affecting drug absorption. A positive urine drug screen.
